attributes.action: Explain the double standards in petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Explain why it is ok to "petition the Prime Minister to Ban the British National Party (BNP)."

Submitted by Shahid Anwar 

But it is "potentially libellous, defamatory or false to;  "petition the prime minister to ban the UAF"

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
